title: "The Nightmare"
content:
[url=http://www.godlikeproductions.com/bbs/message.php?page=1&showdate=3/14/07&messageid=359176&mpage=1]The Nightmare[/url]

I was surfing Google about the worms in pork thing when I stumbled across this weird forum saying that on March 29 something about Iran. (Don't understand what he means by "The word is go on Iran and we ain't got long.") But seeing its a conspiracy forum, and the name is "Godlike Productions", I wouldn't start taking it to seriously... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

title: Re: "The Nightmare"
content: Whilst there's no reliable evidence that anyone is planning to invade Iran (none I've seen, anyway), the press over here have pretty much taken it as read that it's going to happen pretty soon. In fact, people have been foretelling it pretty much since shortly after we "won" the war in Iraq. I personally don't know enough about the situation to give an accurate opinion on how likely it is, but as I'm a cynic I assume that it's inevitable. Ah well.[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: "The Nightmare"
content:
I'm too confused about everything and can't say what'd be good or not. But I guess this wouldn't be a good thing? Or would it? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: "The Nightmare"
content:
They won't; thy're stupid, but not that stupid.

Iran is safe as houses.

title: Re: "The Nightmare"
content:
What dumb ass would try to take out Iran? They're Persians. You saw what they did to those Spartans.


=P


Either way, the only jackass who'd try to start something with Iran would be America's current president. And he's not politically strong enough to lift a dime off the ground right now.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...
